channel.title: Bleachbit
channel.description:
Would it be OK to use Bleachbit on the workstation? Of course not in root but just the regular way?
I understand Whonix is persistent and not meant to be amensic. I just want to limit the available files/cache especially deleted files.
Didn't find anything on it while searching. Thanks.

item.title: Bleachbit
item.dc:creator: whonixfaithful
item.description:
After using the non root option I got an error pop up. It wouldn’t go away until the workstation was rebooted.

Using the root option bricked the whole thing! It wouldn’t boot afterwards. Fortunately I had snapshots.

Do not use Bleachbit at all!

Read full topic

item.title: Bleachbit
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Since you understand that… Feel free to use it as per:

Whonix – 3 May 20

Design and Goals

Whonix ™ Overview. Online Anonymity via Tor and Security by Isolation. Based on Debian. Whonix ™ Architecture.

Read full topic
